text: The kukri or khukuri ( khukuri) is a knife which is mostly used by Nepali speaking Gurkhas of India and Nepal. The blade of the knife is curved inward, similar to a machete. It is used as both a tool and as a weapon in South Asia. The kukri, khukri, and kukkri spellings are of Indian origin. The original Nepali spelling is khukuri. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Nepali culture Category:Cutting tools Category:Blades
title: Kukri
